metadata.title: Tell Me What's The Reason

xml.lyrics:
Tell me what's the reason, you keep on teasin' me?
Tell me what's the reason, you keep on teasin' me?
You said that you don't want me, but you just won't let me be
Tell me what's the reason, you do the things you do?
Tell me what's the reason, you do the things you do?
Your breakin' my achin' heart, 'til it pains me through an through
I get up in the mornin', feelin' kinda good
Hopin' my baby will do the things she should
I'd take you in my arms an hold you nice n' tight
But all you want to do, is start another fight
Tell me what's the reason, you keep on teasin' me?
Said that you don't love me, then please just set me free
